entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The lightning had thrown the man’s face into sharp relief, and it was a face unlike any Harry had ever seen.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: It looked as though it had been carved out of weathered wood by someone who had only the vaguest idea of what human faces are supposed to look like,

entities.name: man
entities.description: The lightning had thrown the man’s face into sharp relief

relationships.description: Hermione gasped when she saw the man’s face.
